BioData: Republican, of Chatham, VA; born in New York, NY, June 16, 1969; raised in Chatham, VA; education: B.S., Hampden-Sydney College, Hampden-Sydney, VA, 1991; J.D., Mississippi College School of Law, Clinton, MS, 1995; professional: attorney, Chatham Town Council, 2000-01; member of Virginia State House of Delegates, 2002-08; member of Virginia State Senate, 2008-10; committees: Financial Services; elected to the 112th Congress on November 2, 2010; reelected to each succeeding Congress.
